title: Rich Teen Kills 4, Avoids Prison Thanks To 'Affluenza'

comments.text:

sentenced to prison for 20 year as a kid is really crazy too, if you think 
about it.﻿

comments.author: Calvin C

comments.text:
Yeah, this is a person we want to walking free amongst us - someone who is 
either so stupid or so limited he doesn't know right from wrong... 
bullshit.  Even by Texas standards this is bullshit.  Who the fuck were his 
parents the Sultan and Sultana of Brunei - FAR from it.  Fuck from what 
I've read his parents aren't even wealthy - by Texas standards.  Not that 
the asinine defense would've actually made sense had their last name been 
Kinder, McComb, Dell, Mitchell, Walton, or Pickens et al in other words 
REAL Texas money.  We can't even say this is a travesty of justice b/c 
there was NO justice!  I can't believe any state would be this stupid 
especially Texas.  

There is small comfort I am sure, very small, to the victims families that 
this dick will forever be branded not smart enough to know right from wrong 
and certainly not qualified or equipped to be considered a man in any way 
shape or form.  Don't worry, I am sure we'll hear from this.... sub human 
again b/c after all a Judge basically declared he doesn't have enough sense 
to know right from wrong so all bets are off now, lets synchronize our 
watches.......  And as for the parents.... if they're THAT level of fucked 
up then they should've gone to jail in his place and I'm sure they would 
too.  ﻿

comments.author: Joseph Summers

comments.text:
Do you see my fellow Americans? Open your eyes to the Truth of our country; 
we are in a class/wealth and race war. If he was poor and white, he would 
be on his way to the gallows. If he was of ANY other race, he would be on 
his way to the gallows. See this for what it truly is. The justice system 
is telling you that it's' "just us" . The wealthy can do as they please . 
They own justice. Wake up. This has happened all throughout human history; 
especially here in the United States. Be brave and stand up to those who 
are getting away with murder, tyranny and injustice for all but themselves. 
The journey from evil to status quo has begun. Don't let this be your 
present or you won't have a future. ﻿
